tool_description: Convert Healthcare HL7 2.x message to JSON format
name: Convert Hl7 2x Message To JSON
title: Convert Hl7 2x Message To JSON

api_list.name: hl7Json
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://convert-hl7-2x-message-to-json.p.rapidapi.com/hl7Json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "convert-hl7-2x-message-to-json.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
